dlt_views.sql_condition: select meeting_date, case when meeting_loc = 1 then 'ST' when meeting_loc = 2 then 'HV' when meeting_loc = 3 then 'X1' when meeting_loc = 4 then 'X2' when meeting_loc = 5 then 'S1' when meeting_loc = 6 then 'S2' when meeting_loc = 7 then 'S3' when meeting_loc = 8 then 'S4' when meeting_loc = 9 then 'S5' when meeting_loc = 10 then 'CH' end as meeting_location, seg.sub_segment, case when left(case when SOURCE_TYPE = 4 OR SOURCE_TYPE = 19 OR CIT_TYPE = 'IBT' then nvl(CBBT_CENTRE_NO, OLD_CB_CENTRE_NO) else CBBT_CENTRE_NO end, 1) in (3, 6, 9) then 'RC ESC/EWallet' when left(case when SOURCE_TYPE = 4 OR SOURCE_TYPE = 19 OR CIT_TYPE = 'IBT' then nvl(CBBT_CENTRE_NO, OLD_CB_CENTRE_NO) else CBBT_CENTRE_NO end, 1) in (1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8) then 'OCB ESC/Ewallet' when SUBSTRing(V_TERM_NO, 1, 4) = 'TBAS' or SOURCE_TYPE = 17 then 'TBAS' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and CIT_TYPE in ('IOSBS', 'AOSBS') then 'Classic 3-in-1' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and CIT_TYPE in ('JCBWEKBA') then 'eWin' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and CIT_TYPE in ('JCBW') then 'eWin(New)' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and CIT_TYPE in ('IBUT', 'IBUA') then 'Racing Touch' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and CIT_TYPE in ('MASBAI', 'MASBAA') then 'GoalX' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and nvl(CIT_TYPE, '') not in ('AMBS', 'CIT-3', 'CIT3', 'CIT-3A', 'CIT3A', 'CIT-5', 'CIT5', 'CIT6', 'CIT-8', 'CIT8', 'CIT-PDA', 'CITPDA', 'PDA', 'EWIN', 'E-WIN', 'JCBW', 'MANGO', 'JCBWEKBA', 'MANGOCOMBO', 'MANGODELUXE', 'MPB', 'TWM', 'WLPDA', 'ITV', 'ITVBS', 'IP-PHONE', 'IPPHONE', 'IPPBS', 'APINOW', 'IOSBS', 'JCMOW', 'AOSBS', 'APISMC', 'APITD', 'IBUT', 'APIWC', 'IBUA', 'WOSBS', 'MASBAI', 'MASBAA') then 'TB Voice' else 'NA' end as CHANNEL, pmu.bet_type, pmu.race_no, case when bet_type <> 'ALUP' then null when bet_type = 'ALUP' then pmu.allup_race_no1 end as FIRST_RACE_NO, case when allup_event_no = 2 then allup_race_no2 when allup_event_no = 3 then allup_race_no3 when allup_event_no = 4 then allup_race_no4 when allup_event_no = 5 then allup_race_no5 when allup_event_no = 6 then allup_race_no6 else null end as LAST_RACE_NO, false as FO_FLAG, pmu.acct_no as ACCOUNT_NO, ac.CUSTOMER_ID, false as CANCELLED, 0 as CANCELLED_AMOUNT, cast((DATEDIFF(day, cast('1900-01-01' as date), cast(pmu.selling_date as date)) * 1000000000000 + cast(case pmu.oltp_id when 'ACP01' then 20 when 'ACP02' then 21 when 'AGP01' then 17 when 'AGP02' then 18 when 'AGP03' then 19 when 'AGP04' then 1 end as long) * 1000000000 + cast(pmu.headerActivityID as long)) as long) as ticketId, pmu.selling_date, pmu.ac_tran_no, pmu.time_stamp from live.ab_race_pmu_vw pmu left join live.v_wagering_dim_account_vw ac on pmu.acct_no = ac.ACCOUNT_NO left join live.fs_customer_segment_vw seg on ac.CUSTOMER_ID = seg.CUSTOMER_ID
